name: Games Games Games
description:
Games Games Games!
Made  in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 40 "The more you have, the worse it is".
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/games-games-games

Why have only one game when you can have more?!

Press left or right directions to control everything.

Keys: [A]/[D] Left/Right

Controller should work too?

Unity and Aseprite.

Music & SFX with Reaper + Pocket Operators.

Typodermic fonts.
